About Me

A bit about myself....

Your project is in correct hands

I am an experienced data analyst and speciaized in SEO and Google Ads campaign. Worked on various analytics project in Banking and Finance Sectors of Canada to make the best informed decision. Also worked with various startups to analyze the site, perform best SEO practices and Google Ad campaigns to get more conversions and rank well on Google.

Apart from being an analyst and SEO specialist, I enjoy going out with my family and friends for Trekking, and Travelling around India. Also, I am an avid foodie who loves to eat local street food and international foods. Enjoy to get to know how many different ways the food is made and their ingredients. When I am indoor, love to read various business and fictional books, watch thriller and horror movies/TV shows, surfing on the net, and watches Premier League matches. Sometimes I blog on my past travel experiences.
